title: Voyageurs National Park: Kettle Falls
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours     Kettle Falls                Kettle Falls Area Programs         Enjoy the view over looking the Kettle Falls Dam and look south into Canada   Walk Kettle Falls Dam Tour Meet out front of the Kettle Falls Hotel. A ranger will guide you through the history of the area and walk to the dam overlook (1/4 mile walk, not accessible). In order to participate, visitors must take the Kettle Falls Cruise or must take their own watercraft to the Kettle Falls area.  For more information, call the visitor center at (218) 875-2111. Free June 19- August 19, 2016 Sunday, Tuesday, Friday 1 pm- 1:30 pm Thursday 6 pm- 6:30 pm August 23-September 22, 2016 Sunday 1:30 pm- 2pm Tuesday, Thursday 1 pm- 1:30 pm     Â    Extra! Extra! Read all about it! Download the Kettle Falls Gazette & Menu before you venture out to the "Jewel of the Forest" and read interesting stories and fun facts about the Kettle Falls Hotel and area.
